markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: ## Week 1 Lesson 2 Good Evening ## Before we start Let's do a quick review (I will ask questions) ## But before that Let's sign up for a github account 1. Google: github 2. Use the email that you signed up with for this course 3. Get ready ### Things taught in last lesson - Introduction - What programming is - How to solve a problem - Sources of resources - Installing Important Staff - Ubuntu on windows - VS code - nodejs - Exercism ## ..Continue - HTML - Use of basics tags - head - body - div - img - p - ol, ul, li - a - h1, h2 ... h6 - What a basic page looks like ## ..Continue aggin - JavaScript Basics (FAQs, running environment, variables, comments, operators) - terminal - cd - ls - touch - cp - rm - sudo - exit - clear ### Topics we will learn today - JavaScript Conditionals and loops - Functions - ES6 syntax - CSS (to make site with plain HTML look better)
